name: Search Google Sheet Rows -> Post on Webflow Blog

expect.name: from
expect.label: Enter a Spreadsheet ID and Sheet Name

messages.content: You are a helpful, intelligent writing assistant.
Read the following article and write a short, one-sentence summary. This summary will be posted on our blog. Write nothing except for the summary.

spec.name: url
spec.label: URL
spec.help: Valid URL with Image extension in it.

spec.name: slug
spec.label: Slug
spec.help: Must be alphanumerical and not contain any spaces or special characters
